Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Establishes the local initiatives task force on housing
Summary: Establishes the local initiatives task force on housing, in order to collaborate with local government officials, state agencies, and stakeholders to develop best practices for local governments to incentivize housing development.
ActClause: AN ACT establishing the local initiatives task force on housing; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
